nodes.text: Skycycles were large, sturdy speeder bike-like vehicles with impressive flight ceilings. Lido Mufrenes employed a skycycle on Nar Shaddaa until it was stolen from him by Vilmarh Grahrk.
Gorto Zaga had a number of skycycles made from ship parts on Kiffex. These were stolen by Vilmarh Grahrk so he and his Jedi allies could escape Deadend.
